name: Nick Rosado
para1: I teach literature for the same reason Homer sang — because these stories matter, and because most of us were never given the tools to really enter them.
para2: My courses are built around a simple conviction: the great epic poems are not difficult because they are obscure, but because they are deep. Given the right context, the right questions, and the right companions for the journey, anyone can read them — and be changed by them.
para3: The Divine Comedy course is fully built and available. The Iliad course launches Q2 2026. The Aeneid and Paradise Lost follow through the year.
